item.title: About
item.description: Specialist in Distributed Secure Systems Currently I am currently working as Head of IT Architecture for Verimi, contributing to the overall objective to give users back the control over their secure identity. Specifically, I am involved in IT/Cloud architecture decisions, security/risk assessments, technology evaluations and the continuous improvement of the tech-team. In my opinion, Verimi is worldwide unique and offers users the chance of a secure digital identity and sovereignty over their own data.

item.title: CV
item.description: Professional Experience With specialization in secure distributed systems I gained experiences coordination, analysis, research & development activities in French, German and international institutes, all being international & multicultural environments: Since 2018: Head of IT Architecture Verimi, Berlin, Germany Main activities: Contribute to improving the tech-team, IT/cloud architecture decisions, security & risk analyses, making developers having fun at their job 2016 – 2018: Software architect & engineer (R&D, “Blockchain” specialization) LIRIS Lab, INSA de Lyon, France
